snippet: Thousands of Israelis filed past the body of former Prime Minister Ariel Sharon on Sunday, some expressing admiration for his reputation as a leader unafraid to take risks and others voicing harsh assessments.
abstract: Israelis attending funeral of Prime Min Ariel Sharon express both praise and criticism for his tenure; some view Sharon, a polarizing figure, as a bold decision maker, while others revile him for removing Jewish settlements in Gaza.
lead_paragraph: Thousands of Israelis filed past the body of former Prime Minister Ariel Sharon on Sunday, some expressing admiration for his reputation as a leader unafraid to take risks and others voicing harsh assessments.

headline.main: Praise and Criticism as Sharon’s Body Lies in State
headline.print_headline: Praise and Criticism as Sharon’s Body Lies in State
